body.p: For a list of major relational databases and the drivers that are available for them, see .
In addition, the following is a list of other popular databases along with instructions for getting the drivers that are necessary to access the databases in :

ul.li: Berkeley DB XML database - Copy the jar files from the Berkeley database install directory into the install directory as described in the procedure for configuring a Berkeley DB data source.
eXist database - Copy the jar files from the eXist database install directory to the install directory as described in the procedure for configuring an eXist data source.
MarkLogic database - Download the MarkLogic driver from MarkLogic Community site.
Microsoft SQL Server 2005 / 2008 database - Download the appropriate MS SQL JDBC driver from the Microsoft website.
Oracle 11g database - Go to and download the Oracle 11g JDBC driver called ojdbc6.jar.
PostgreSQL 8.3 database - Go to and download the PostgreSQL 8.3 JDBC3 driver.
